name: bot-template
description: A bot template to use the hashi package.

scripts.build: npm run run-builder && npm run prettier && tsc && npm run save
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && git commit -m "[AUTO] Build"
scripts.publish-patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.publish-minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.publish-major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags

author: elouannh
